content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapsecsvFormt] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [adls_gen2_trip] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://ajmnugiqxczz6x2poc.blob.core.windows.net/independent' 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE trip-data(
    

	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'yellow/puYear=*/puMonth=*/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [adls_gen2_trip],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapsecsvFormt] 
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM nyc_yellow_taxi
GO
